title: What's Former LPL Chief Mark Casady Up To Now? Breaking Fintech Apart.
description: Old concepts must be disrupted to create "new solutions in the marketplace," says Mark Casady, who's now running a venture capital firm.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Old concepts must be disrupted to create "new solutions in the marketplace," says Mark Casady, who's now running a venture capital firm.
